description:
SAP ECC is one of the most widely used ERP system in the globe. Learning new SAP skills in SAP can help opening tremendous job opportunities and career advancement.

SAP Sales Order Process is an excellent introductory course that will enable anyone interested in learning the minimum requirements to create, change, and display a sales order in SAP ECC system (former R/3).

This course is divided in five sessions covering the following topics:

- Standard Sales Order

- Free of charge

- Credit memo request

- Debit memo request

- Sales order report

The instructor will guide you through an overview in a short presentation, followed by a step-by-step demo, with some tips and shortcut keys using SAP ECC - Sales Orders.

I hope you enjoy this course.

Thank you.
title: Easy SAP SD - Sales Order Process for end users!
